column1: ap 04:30|4:30|"“You are to dig one hole each day
column2: including Saturdays and Sundays. Each hole must be five feet deep
column3: and five feet across in every direction. Your shovel is your measuring stick. Breakfast is served at 4:30.”"|Holes|"Louis Sachar"

column1: ap 03:15|3:15|"Ms. Morengo explained that she was a patent attorney. “I’m helping your father with the new product he’s invented. He happened to mention your situation
column2: so I did a little investigating. Clyde Livingston’s sneakers were stolen sometime before 3:15. I found a young man
column4: who said that at 3:20 you were in the bathroom fishing your notebook out of the toilet. Two girls remembered seeing you come out of the boys’ restroom carrying a wet notebook.”"|Holes|"Louis Sachar"
